HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku App Name, Must Be the same above else you can't upgrade

SESSION_ID.description: Session ID for authentication or tracking.

SUDO.description: User ID with sudo permissions for the bot.

BOT_INFO.description: Information about the bot, such as version or ID.

STICKER_PACK.description: Set the bot sticker meta data

PREFIX.description: Set the bot handler, you must choose one, multi prefix not supported
